title: Mow the Lawn
description: Mow the entire front and back lawn, including trimming around trees and edges.

title: Weed Garden Beds
description: Remove all weeds from the flower and vegetable garden beds.

title: Trim Hedges
description: Trim the hedges along the property line to a uniform height and shape.

title: Fertilize Lawn
description: Apply lawn fertilizer according to package instructions.

title: Clean Gutters
description: Remove leaves and debris from gutters and downspouts.
